page.title: 03Farming around Belper(1)
page.content: At{Sycamore Farm}they have a special breed of sheep called Dorset Polled and Dorset Long Horns.They are special because they mate twice a year. The Hills have lived there for 14years and say it is very hard work. The breeding season starts in September so that the lambs are ready for market at Easter. If the weather is wet it could kill the lambs.Mr.& Mrs.Hill have very good quality sheep and they win a lot of shows. When it is the breeding season the ram has a strap with an ink pad on his chest.When the ram mounts the ewe, you know which ram is responsible. {Nether Nook Farm}has Charollais, Hereford and Guernsey cattle. There is an old windmill that used to pump up water for{Nether Nook,Crowtrees}and {Palefence.}Crowtrees and Palefence have Friesian cows and Palefence Farm has four horses.
